participant_1.background:
I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee!
I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
i studied business as my major.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.

participant_2.background:
My favorite food is campfire stew, because it is warm and filling, and it reminds me of my childhood.
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
my favorite hero is superman.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I like to wear clothing that is comfortable and modest, and that reflects my faith.

content.text: Hey there! I hope you are having a great day!
Hey! I am doing well, thanks for asking. I am getting ready for work!
Oh, that sounds exciting! What do you do for work?
I am a potter. I make pottery all day.
Oh, that is cool! I have never met a potter before.
Well, now you have! I am glad to meet you!
Same here! I am a teacher. I work with kids all day.
Oh, that is awesome! I am sure you are a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best.
What is your favorite thing about teaching?
I love seeing the kids learn and grow. It is so rewarding.
That sounds great! I am sure you are a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best!
What is your favorite thing to make in pottery?
I love making mugs. I think they are so cute.
I love mugs too! They are so useful.
Me too! They are great for drinking coffee or tea.
What is your favorite kind of coffee?
I love iced coffee! I love the way it is cold and refreshing.
I love iced coffee too! It is the best on a hot day.
Me too! I love it when it is hot outside
